description: Thiessen Orchards is a family-owned apple orchard offering a variety of seasonal activities, including pick-your-own apples, hay rides, a pumpkin patch, and a 3-acre corn maze The orchard features a Kountry Kitchen serving homemade treats like apple pie and caramel apples, along with a flower shop selling Mennonite sausage.
The orchard has been operated by the Thiessen family since 1934. It provides a rustic, family-friendly experience from early September to late October.
Photo by Andrea Stockel, licensed CC0 public domain.
